headline: Built on Sand
abstract: Christopher Knowlton’s “Bubble in the Sun” tells a story of fortunes made and lost in Florida real estate.
lead_paragraph: BUBBLE IN THE SUNThe Florida Boom of the 1920s and How It Brought On the Great DepressionBy Christopher Knowlton
keywords: Bubble in the Sun: The Florida Boom of the 1920s and How It Brought On the Great Depression (Book)
